```{r setup}
SciViews::R
```

```{r importation}
Zooplankton <- read("zooplankton", package = "data.io", lang = "AN")
```

The following graphic is about a zooplankton 

```{r graphique}
chart(data = zooplankton, size ~ class %col=% class) +
  geom_violin() +
  coord_flip()
```
